Namespace AV.Status


Defined in: av.js.

Namespace Summary
Constructor Attributes Constructor Name and Description
 
AV.Status
Contains functions to deal with Status in AVOS Cloud.

Namespace Detail
AV.Status
Contains functions to deal with Status in AVOS Cloud.
Method Detail
<static> {AV.Query, AV.Promise} AV.Status.countUnreadStatuses(source)
Count unread statuses in someone's inbox.For example:

 AV.Status.countUnreadStatuses(AV.User.current()).then(function(response){
   console.log(response.unread); //unread statuses number.
   console.log(response.total);  //total statuses number.
 });

Parameters:
{Object} source
The status source.
Since:
0.3.0
Returns:
{AV.Query} The query object for status.
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled when the count completes.
{AV.Promise} destroy(options)
Destroy this status,then it will not be avaiable in other user's inboxes.
Parameters:
{Object} options
An optional Backbone-like options object with success and error callbacks that will be invoked once the iteration has finished.
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled when the destroy completes.
get(attr)
Gets the value of an attribute in status data.
Parameters:
{String} attr
The string name of an attribute.
<static> {AV.InboxQuery} AV.Status.inboxQuery(owner, inboxType)
Create a inbox status query to find someone's inbox statuses.For example:

  //Find current user's default inbox statuses.
  var query = AV.Status.inboxQuery(AV.User.current());
  //find the statuses after the last message id
  query.sinceId(lastMessageId);
  query.find().then(function(statuses){
     //process statuses
  });

Parameters:
{Object} owner
The inbox's owner
{String} inboxType
The inbox type,'default' by default.
Since:
0.3.0
Returns:
{AV.InboxQuery} The inbox query object.
See:
AV.InboxQuery
{AV.Promise} send(options)
Send a status by a AV.Query object.

For example,send a status to male users:

    var status = new AVStatus('image url', 'a message');
    status.query = new AV.Query('_User');
    status.query.equalTo('gender', 'male');
    status.send().then(function(){
             //send status successfully.
     }, function(err){
            //an error threw.
            console.dir(err);
     });

Parameters:
{Object} options
An optional Backbone-like options object with success and error callbacks that will be invoked once the iteration has finished.
Since:
0.3.0
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled when the send completes.
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.Status.sendPrivateStatus(status, target, options)

Send a status from current signined user to other user's private status inbox.

For example,send a private status to user '52e84e47e4b0f8de283b079b':

   var status = new AVStatus('image url', 'a message');
    AV.Status.sendPrivateStatus(status, '52e84e47e4b0f8de283b079b').then(function(){
             //send status successfully.
     }, function(err){
            //an error threw.
            console.dir(err);
     });

Parameters:
{AV.Status} status
A status object to be send to followers.
target
The target user or user's objectId.
{Object} options
An optional Backbone-like options object with success and error callbacks that will be invoked once the iteration has finished.
Since:
0.3.0
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled when the send completes.
<static> {AV.Promise} AV.Status.sendStatusToFollowers(status, options)
Send a status to current signined user's followers.For example: 

    var status = new AVStatus('image url', 'a message');
    AV.Status.sendStatusToFollowers(status).then(function(){
             //send status successfully.
     }, function(err){
            //an error threw.
            console.dir(err);
     });

Parameters:
{AV.Status} status
A status object to be send to followers.
{Object} options
An optional Backbone-like options object with success and error callbacks that will be invoked once the iteration has finished.
Since:
0.3.0
Returns:
{AV.Promise} A promise that is fulfilled when the send completes.
set(key, value)
Sets a hash of model attributes on the status data.
Parameters:
{String} key
The key to set.
value
The value to give it.
<static> {AV.Query} AV.Status.statusQuery(source)
Create a status query to find someone's published statuses.For example:

  //Find current user's published statuses.
  var query = AV.Status.statusQuery(AV.User.current());
  query.find().then(function(statuses){
     //process statuses
  });

Parameters:
{Object} source
The status source.
Since:
0.3.0
Returns:
{AV.Query} The query object for status.
{AV.Object} toObject()
Cast the AV.Status object to an AV.Object pointer.
Returns:
{AV.Object} A AV.Object pointer.
